baseRule.text: 若比丘尼遮僧分衣。波逸提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 84

fullParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī dhammikaṁ cīvaravibhaṅgaṁ paṭibāheyya, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 27

translations.text: Welche Nonne aber die rechtmäßige Teilung des Robenmaterials verzögert, muß dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni block a robe-cloth distribution that is in accordance with the rule, it is to be confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang menghalangi sebuah distribusi kain jubah yang sesuai dengan aturan, itu harus di akui.

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，作如是意：『眾僧如法分衣，遮令不分，恐弟子不得。』者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 108

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。僧分衣時不隨者。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 137

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻尼不共他分衣者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 147
